title: The Crown season 3 finally releases full trailer for Olivia Colman episodes
text:

We finally have a full trailer for the third season of The Crown.

The royal Netflix series teased the drama to come as we see Queen Elizabeth II (Oscar-winner Olivia Colman replacing Claire Foy ) preach the importance of duty, while her son and heir Prince Charles (Josh O'Connor) is warned by who appears to be Wallis Simpson about not turning his back on true love, over shots of Emerald Fennell as Camilla Shand, later his second wife.

We also see scenes of domestic arguments turning physical between Princess Margaret (now played by Helena Bonham Carter ) and her roguish husband, Anthony Armstrong-Jones, Lord Snowdon (now played by Ben Daniels).

At least Elizabeth can count on the support of husband Prince Philip (now Tobias Menzies) in the new series, as her children look set to become the centre of the drama, along with the celebrations of the Jubilee Day and the tragedy of the Aberfan disaster.

It certainly looks set to be an emotional series of The Crown, with the trailer set to an emotional cover of Bob Dylan classic The Times They Are A-Changin'.



(Image: NETFLIX)

The official Netflix description reads: "The third season of The Crown sees a new guard sweep into Downing Street, as Queen Elizabeth (Olivia Colman) and her family struggle to meet the challenges of a rapidly changing Britain. From cold-war paranoia, through to the jet-set and the space age - the exuberance of the 1960s and the long hangover of the 1970s - Elizabeth and the Royals must adapt to a new, more liberated, but also more turbulent world.

"Written by Peter Morgan, The Crown also stars Helena Bonham Carter as Princess Margaret, Tobias Menzies as The Duke of Edinburgh, Josh O'Connor as Prince Charles, Erin Doherty as Princess Anne, Ben Daniels as Lord Snowdon, Jason Watkins as Prime Minister Harold Wilson and Charles Dance as Lord Mountbatten."

Not long to wait now!

The Crown season 3 is released on November 17, 2019.

Are you excited for the return of The Crown season 3? Let us know in the comments below.
description: The Crown season 3 has finally released a full trailer for the royal Netflix drama starring Olivia Colman
